attributes.action: bring in a swiss voting system, as the majority are being silenced
attributes.additional_details:
we asked for a referendum on our eu membership, and it was ignored !

the common man and woman in the uk are being ignored on matters that affect and annoy them on a daily basis.

this can be ended with a swiss style voting system were every single person gets to have their say.

if someone disagrees with me they can vote against, but if millions disagree their voices are not heard.

we need to restore full democracy to the people.
